oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Production of bioactive phenolic compounds by berry cell cultures
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Puupponen-Pimiä, Riitta
Biedermann, Olivier
Nohynek, Liisa
Oksman-Caldentey, Kirsi-Marja
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Food security, food quality and human health
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The production of phenolic compounds by berry cell cultures of strawberry (Fragaria x ananassa) was studied and the biosynthesis of phenolic compounds was stimulated by elicitation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Puupponen-Pimiä, Riitta; Biedermann, Olivier; Nohynek, Liisa and Oksman-Caldentey, Kirsi-Marja (2007) Production of bioactive phenolic compounds by berry cell cultures. In: NJF Report, Nordic Association of Agricultural Scientists, p. 47.
